com.gwtplatform.dispatch.shared

Class UnsecuredActionImpl<R extends Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtplatform.dispatch.shared.UnsecuredActionImpl<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The Result type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsSerializable, Action<R>
    Deprecated. 
    Please use UnsecuredActionImpl.

    @Deprecated
public class UnsecuredActionImpl<R extends Result>
extends Object
implements Action<R>
    Default Action using the base path as dispatch/className. The base abstract implementation is Action. https://github.com/ArcBees/GWTP/wiki/RPC-Dispatch An Action that uses the standard service name "dispatch". Actions inheriting from this are not secured against XSRF attacks, and they will work even if you do not configure a SecurityCookie. Use UnsecuredActionImpl for secured set to on by default.
